name: Piano Magic Tiles 2: Christmas
description:
Play the best Piano Magic Tiles 2 - White Tiles on your iPhone & iPad now! FOR FREE! It's the best Christmas Games in this coming Xmas!

Have you ever dreamed of becoming a professional pianist like Beethoven, Chopin or Mozart? Have you ever dreamed of playing classical songs like Little Star, Canon or Jingle Bells on a piano?

Now your dream can come true with Piano Magic Tiles 2: Black & White Tiles! Piano Magic Tiles 2 is the latest hit piano app to take iOS by storm. With this piano app even a child can play classical songs like a real piano master. It’s easy to learn, and incredibly fun to play! With Piano Magic Tiles 2: Black & White Tiles your iPhone & iPad becomes a magic piano, by tapping on the black tiles, you can play your favourite songs just like the best pianists!

Piano Magic Tiles 2: Christmas Music Songs is your choice! With redesigned graphics, optimized tunes, and 300+ songs, Magic Piano: Christmas Music Songs will bring you fresh gaming experience and make this Christmas more fun and hilarious!

HOW TO PLAY:
Piano Magic Tiles 2: Christmas Music Songs (Black & White Tiles) is very simple to play!
1) Tap the black tiles, don’t tap the white tiles. Do not miss any black tiles ever after high speed soundtrack.
2) When there comes a long tile, press down on the long tile and release at its end.
3) Control your tempo as the tiles goes quicker and quicker.
4) Make it to the end, and collect the bonus coins and diamonds after you finish the song.

Notes:
1) Coins and diamonds can be used to unlock locked songs.
2) Play daily challenges to win more diamonds.
3) Listen to the whole song before and after you play. Just tap the headphone icon on the left.
4) Select your favorite instruments: Piano, Electric Piano or Harpsichord.
5) Enter the endless mode directly by tapping the quick play icon on the right, without having to start from scratch.
6) Play hard to win! A lot of achievements and rewards are waiting for you!
7) Watch video to get free diamonds if you are in need.
8) Add songs to the favorite list by just toggling the heart icon on the upper right.

FEATURES:
1) Awesome graphics and sound effect. Playing this tile app is like playing a real grand piano.
2) High quality piano music soundtracks. Features a large collection of piano songs from Mozart, Chopin, Bach, Tchaikovsky, to Beethoven.
3) Hit songs including: Happy Birthday to You, Little Star(Mozart), Jingle Bells, Canon, Fur Elise(Beethoven), Swan Lake, etc.
4) Simple to play, difficult to excel. Tapping only the black tiles, avoid the white tiles can be very challenging under high speed circumstances!
5) Smooth gaming experience. We tried our best to turn your mobile phone into a magic piano with great sound effects.
6) Regular Updates! Frequently updating Magic Piano: Christmas Tiles 2 to fix any bugs and come up with new awesome features.
7) Magic Rush. After you play the whole piano song, you can enter the ENDLESS mode directly by tap the fast play button.
8) Favorite List. You can save your favorite piano songs. Easy to access your favorite songs and songs recently played.

Remember, just tap the black tiles, don’t tap the white tiles!
